content: I've always been fascinated by the cityscapes of Paris, and I think I'll set my painting there. I'd love to capture the vibrant colors and energy of the city, especially along the Seine River. I can imagine using soft, feathery brushstrokes to suggest the misty atmosphere and the play of light on the water. At the same time, I want to incorporate bold, geometric forms to depict the buildings and streets. I'm thinking of using a combination of blues and greens to evoke a sense of calm, but also adding pops of bright color to capture the energy of the city.
